hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RUN_IN_PARALLEL
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Run the tests in parallel using pabot

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
SRC=$WORKSPACE/src WEBHOST=nginx # Setup configuration for robot job ZIP_SRC=$(ls openmicroscopy*zip) unzip $ZIP_SRC rm -f $ZIP_SRC mv $WORKSPACE/${ZIP_SRC%.zip} $SRC
ZIP_DIST=$(ls OMERO.server*.zip) unzip $ZIP_DIST rm -f $ZIP_DIST mv $WORKSPACE/${ZIP_DIST%.zip} $SRC/dist
virtualenv $WORKSPACE/omero-virtualenv --system-site-packages source $WORKSPACE/omero-virtualenv/bin/activate pip install -r $SRC/dist/share/web/requirements-py27.txt pip install "robotframework==3.0.2" "robotframework-selenium2library==3.0.1"
if [ "$RUN_IN_PARALLEL" = "true" ]; then pip install "robotframework-pabot==0.43" fi
$SRC/dist/bin/omero config set omero.web.prefix $WEB_PREFIX
cd $SRC/dist
bash ../components/tests/ui/robot_setup.sh mv $SRC/dist/robot_ice.config $SRC/components/tests/ui/resources/ export ICE_CONFIG=$SRC/components/tests/ui/resources/robot_ice.config $SRC/dist/bin/omero --path $SRC/components/tests/ui/plugins robot config --protocol http --webhost $WEBHOST --remoteurl 'http://seleniumhub:4444/wd/hub' --dc 'browserName:${BROWSER},javascriptEnabled:True' >$SRC/components/tests/ui/resources/config.txt
sed -i.bak -re 's/(\{SERVER_ID\}.*1)/\{SERVER_ID\} 2/' $SRC/components/tests/ui/resources/config.txt
echo Running the UI tests
if [ "$RUN_IN_PARALLEL" = "true" ]; then # Run the tests on both Chrome and Firefox $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml -Dtest.with.fail=false web-firefox-pabot $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml -Dtest.with.fail=false web-firefox-rerun-chrome-pabot else $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml -Dtest.with.fail=false web-firefox # re-run the failures in Chrome $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml -Dtest.with.fail=false web-firefox-rerun-chrome fi
# Combines the outputs $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml merge-results-rerun-firefox # Run only on Firefox # $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml -Dtest.with.fail=false web-firefox
# Run a single test # $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml web-firefox -DTEST=view_image.txt # $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml aggregate-results
deactivate
